column3: Can these just be changed, or is this bound to the signing key somehow?\nPing @theuni\n
Grr, I looked into all of this at one point, but didn't document. I'll do so again, this time documenting what we can change at-will, and what would break packaging assumptions.\n
This would break code signing with the current key (the current certificate is tied to the bundle identifier).\n
Ok, closing for now, can be reopened if the underlying issue is solved (e.g. switched to a different cert) \n
